name: Tetro-Cleaner
description:
Someone's playing this arcade game, but they're too bad! Can you at least help them without dying?

Controls: 

  • Movement: A/D
  • Change Weapon: W/S
  • Use Weapon: SPACE

Made in very little time for Ludum Dare 50 (COMPO).

All code and assets are mine. Sounds made with SFXR.
